name: newRPL

screenshots.caption: newRPL alpha running on HP 50g hardware

short_description: This project proposes to reimplement from scratch the RPL language made popular by HP programmable calculators, in portable C/C++. The main goal is to release a version including a user interface running on existing (or new) calculator hardware, and possibly as a desktop application as well.
summary: The classic RPL programming language reimplemented and reimagined.
